channel.title: How do i fix items? :(
channel.description: hey umm i have a source with some items that are a little glitched, like they usally go in the wrong slot or something. anyone know how i can fix

item.title: How do i fix items? :(
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

oh well if its a custom item you added it wouldnt be in there yet because its new so if you added a top hat you would have to in items.cfg look around or do CTRL+F and serch public static int hats[] then after that you should see abunch of ids for w/e that item is scroll down a bit you should see the end of all the items like the last code for me its 2526}; so after the 2526 and say the top hat id is like 336 you would add it by doing , 336}: so in the end it would like this this 2526, 336};
then just save compile wear the top hat or w.e and it should be in the right spot if this doenst help serch on youtube how to add custom items there may be a good video to help you

Read full topic

item.title: How do i fix items? :(
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

oh to make a item you go into item.java not under config and lets say you wana add a ammulet you will look for this
public static int amulets[] = {4035,6577, 10519, 10413, 11204, 11205, 1120611146,
11147, 11148, 11149, 11150, 11151, 11152, 11141, 6857, 6859, 6861,
6863, 1724, 1718, 6585, 86, 774, 87, 295, 421, 552, 589, 1478,
1692, 1694, 1696, 1698, 1700, 1702, 1704, 1706, 1708, 1710, 1712,
1725, 1727, 1729, 1731, 4021, 4081, 4250, 4677, 6040, 6041, 6208,
11274, 11275, 11276, 11273, 11941, 13888 };

ok so say you just added a ammulet and its in weapon slot what you gota do is after the last one for me its a 13888 make a , (itemid) };
just make sure you look for like the weapon one you would want to find public static int weapons[] and do the same

Read full topic
